pr_title: [ISSUE #2300] Enhancement: Benchmark support acl and msg trace

timeline.message: [Benchmark]Support acl, add msgTraceEnable option for producer and consumer, fix Algorithm HmacSHA1 not available using openjdk

timeline.bodyText: You need to maintain compatibility and let users choose whether to use ACL instead of forcing users to use ACL.
timeline.author: RongtongJin

replies.bodyText: OK, I will fix it ASAP.
replies.author: maixiaohai

replies.bodyText: @RongtongJin  I‘ve fixed it, pls review it~
